name: Infinite Space Delivery
description:
W - Forward thrust

D - Reverse thrust

A / S -  Rotate Left / Right

Spacebar - Interact, Respawn

Code & music: gwaiLoFi

Ship pixel art and animations: Rebellious (https://rebellious.artstation.com/)

Planet and star pixel art: Emily Leung. 

Special thanks to Rokkabilly for the code guidance!

Game created from scratch except for the dialogue UI, which was derived from Mister Taft's Zeldalike art assets.
